howItWorks.title: Markdown Typography Guide
howItWorks.element1_content:
# Markdown Samples

This view demonstrates various Markdown elements you can use.

---

## Typography

*   **Bold Text**
*   *Italic Text*
*   `Inline Code`

## Lists

1.  First ordered list item
2.  Another item
    *   Unordered sub-list.

## Block Elements

> This is a blockquote. It's great for highlighting important information or quotes from a source.

```javascript
// This is a code block
function greet(name) {
  console.log(`Hello, ${name}!`);
}
```

## Links

You can also add standard Markdown links like this one to [Google](https://www.google.com).
